description.value:
The Undying lets you choose from an expanded list of spells when you learn a warlock spell. The following spells are added to the warlock spell list for you.

Spell LevelSpells
cantrip@UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplGuidance00]{Guidance}, @UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplResistance]{Resistance}
1st@UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplBless00000]{Bless}, @UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplFalseLife0]{False Life}
2nd@UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.mycojDbHOZg2luJc]{Blindness/Deafness}, @UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.TsXoAnsMto2MIufg]{Silence}
3rd@UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplFeignDeath]{Feign Death}, @UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplSpeakWithD]{Speak with Dead}
4th@UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.uXfYWzBEwej7LOZr]{Aura of Life}, @UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.OnYKg4boLKhXpmlX]{Death Ward}
5th@UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.4FaXMyU2b5DXqnFv]{Contagion}, @UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.PyfqrpVvGSUVYqXf]{Legend Lore}
